d1_text:
Npc1270:
ï¿½In order to defeat Giygas,[PAUSE 15] who is attacking from the past,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you must warp to the past.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½This can be done by way of the ï¿½Phase Distorter 3.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½However, the machine cannot warp living things,[PAUSE 15] I mean lifeforms.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Life is demolished in the process of warping.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The only way to accomplish the time travel is[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½to transfer your brain ï¿½programï¿½ into a robot,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½and send the robot to the past.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...The transfer means that your spirit will go with the robot[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½while your body is left behind...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I cannot promise that your spirit will come back after the battle in the past.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Yet, you must understand that the four of you are the chosen ones.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you still wish to face Giygas by traveling to the past?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
 [LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C9BF68 L_C9BF2C]
; $C9BF2C
L_C9BF2C:
ï¿½Yes, it's natural to feel as you do.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The only thing left is the destruction of our planet...[HALT][END]
d1_lines: ï¿½In order to defeat Giygas,[PAUSE 15] who is attacking from the past,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you must warp to the past.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½This can be done by way of the ï¿½Phase Distorter 3.ï¿½[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½However, the machine cannot warp living things,[PAUSE 15] I mean lifeforms.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Life is demolished in the process of warping.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The only way to accomplish the time travel is[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½to transfer your brain ï¿½programï¿½ into a robot,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½and send the robot to the past.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½...The transfer means that your spirit will go with the robot[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½while your body is left behind...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I cannot promise that your spirit will come back after the battle in the past.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Yet, you must understand that the four of you are the chosen ones.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Do you still wish to face Giygas by traveling to the past?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
[LOAD_STRING "Yes"]
[LOAD_STRING "No"]
[PRINT_STRINGS_HORZ 2]
[CREATE_MENU]
[CLEAR_LINE]
[MULTI_GOTO L_C9BF68 L_C9BF2C]
; $C9BF2C
L_C9BF2C:
ï¿½Yes, it's natural to feel as you do.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½The only thing left is the destruction of our planet...[HALT][END]
